# cardsAgainstAadit
Cards Against Humanity style web game for AQA A-Level Computer Science NEA

# Setup
## development
- backend: nodemon server/server.js in root
- frontend: npm run start in root/client

### environment variables 

create an .env file and populate it with the following:

```
SESSION_
GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=1021904483397-k9sk4a2br04cbstsoo7i09kasvjvn0hn.apps.googleusercontent.com
GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=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
PORT=3001

```

## production
